LisaacTM Platform

SDL_KEYBOARD

Xavier Oswald
REPEAT & DELAY:
delay
SDL default value is 500;
interval
SDL default velur is 30
enable_key_repeat
Enable/Disable keyboard repeat. Keyboard repeat defaults to off. delay is the initial delay in ms between the time when a key is pressed, and keyboard repeat begins. interval is the time in ms between keyboard repeat events. If delay is set to 0, keyboard repeat is disabled.
set_defaut_key_repeat
Set good default value provided by the SDL library
get_key_repeat
Get delay and interval values
 
UNICODE handling
previous_state
Previous unicode state
enable_unicode
Enable/Disable UNICODE translation of keyboard input. This translation has some overhead, so translation defaults off. If enable is 1, translation is enabled. If enable is 0, translation is disabled. If enable is -1, the translation state is not changed. This function set the previous_state slot
 
Keys mod and state
get_mod_state
Get the current key modifier state
set_mod_state
Set the current key modifier state. This does not change the keyboard state, only the key modifier flags.
get_key_name
Get the name of an SDL virtual keysym
 
TODO: check fast_array & native_array convertion
get_key_state
Memory buffer of the current keyboard. Get a snapshot of the current state of the keyboard. Returns an array of keystates, indexed by the SDLK_

- Self: SELF. enable_key_repeat  ( delay_p : INTEGER, interval_p : INTEGER)

Description:
Enable/Disable keyboard repeat. Keyboard repeat defaults to off. delay is the initial delay in ms between the time when a key is pressed, and keyboard repeat begins. interval is the time in ms between keyboard repeat events. If delay is set to 0, keyboard repeat is disabled.

enable_unicode

.../keyboard/sdl_keyboard.li line #70

Section:
Public

Profile:
- Self: SELF. enable_unicode   enable : INTEGER : INTEGER

Description:
Enable/Disable UNICODE translation of keyboard input. This translation has some overhead, so translation defaults off. If enable is 1, translation is enabled. If enable is 0, translation is disabled. If enable is -1, the translation state is not changed. This function set the previous_state slot
